body.name: yoyomax Mid Century Modern Accent Living Room Linen Fabric Arm Upholstered, Nail-Head Trim Single Sofa Side Chair for Bedroom, Suitable for Reading, Reception, Office-Dark Gray
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 10 mins
features: 【Tailored Comfort】Sink into the lap of luxury with our living room chair, meticulously crafted to cradle you in comfort (25.6” D x 28” W x 34.8” H). Feel the embrace of ergonomic design as the back angle, arm positioning, and width create an experience tailored just for you.

【Enduring Comfort】Embark on a journey of lasting comfort with our high-rebound seat, finding the perfect harmony between firm support and soft indulgence. Whether lost in a book, immersed in gaming, or engaged in friendly chats, this accent chair ensuring you feel at home.

【Easy Maintenance】Wrap yourself in both style and convenience. Our chair's sleek linen-like fabric resists pilling, preserving its timeless allure. Bid farewell to discomfort from button-tufted designs, and welcome the ease of maintenance into your daily sanctuary.

【Lasting Durability】Elevate your space with a dash of mid-century sophistication. The nail-head trim and gracefully turned, tapered legs not only add style but also promise enduring durability. Transform your living room into a haven where timeless charm meets modern comfort.

【Easy Assembly】Unveil your sanctuary effortlessly. With minimal assembly required, our accent chair beckons you to enhance your space with swift ease. Let user-friendly instructions be your guide, turning your assembly process into a seamless transition to instant style and comfort.
body.description: Step into a realm of unparalleled comfort and sophistication with our meticulously designed Linen Living Room Chair.Envelop yourself in the lap of luxury with our thoughtfully crafted living room chair, tailored to provide a unique experience (25.6” D x 28” W x 34.8” H). Let the ergonomic design, precise back angle, and carefully positioned arms create a retreat that's exclusively yours.Embark on a journey of enduring comfort with our high-rebound seat, striking the perfect balance between firm support and indulgent softness. Whether engrossed in a captivating book, lost in the world of gaming, or engrossed in delightful conversations, this accent chair ensures a sense of belonging and relaxation.Wrap yourself in style and convenience. Our chair's sleek linen-like fabric defies pilling, preserving its timeless allure. Bid farewell to discomfort caused by button-tufted designs, and welcome the ease of maintenance into your daily retreat.Elevate your space with a touch of mid-century sophistication. The nail-head trim and gracefully turned, tapered legs not only introduce style but also promise lasting durability. Transform your living room into an oasis where timeless charm seamlessly merges with modern comfort.Unveil your personal sanctuary effortlessly. With minimal assembly required, our accent chair invites you to elevate your space with swift ease. Let user-friendly instructions be your companion, turning the assembly process into a seamless journey to instant style and comfort.Product Dimensions: 25.6"D x 28"W x 34.8"HSpecial Feature: Sturdy, AdjustableProduct Care Instructions: Wipe CleanMaterial: LinenItem Weight: 45 PoundsFrame Material: WoodenSeat Material Type: LinenEmbark on a journey of elegance, comfort, and enduring style with our Linen Living Room Chair.
